excerpt.rendered:
MODEL NUMBER : hC-04

DESCRIPTION : Fine Welded Mono Back Fine Monofilament with 1/8″ long 2 layers of folded undetectable lace at front, 1″ thin clear NPU perimeter at front and Ribbon at sides back. Hair length, color, texture, density, hair direction, and other specialties will be according to your specifications.
